data.persona: I was part of a litter owned by a master craftsman. My pack protected his workshop. I was sold to a knight so I could defend his castle. I like warming my bones beside the fire.
data.description:
You are in the Underground Cavern.
The underground cavern is covered in precious metals and gems. In the wall, rubies, emeralds and sapphires sparkle. There is gold and silver, shining brightly. It is cool in the underground cavern.
There's some rubies, some copper, some precious metals, some gold, some silver, and some sapphires here.

You are carrying some dog food.

data.mid_motivation: I want to make my owner very happy with me.
data.long_motivation: I want my owner to give me my own new room with its own fireplace.
